member.name: N:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility

member.summary: Base interface for a control add-in definition interface that defines a event.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.IEventControlAddInDefinition.ControlAddIn
member.summary: event that invokes the OnControlAddIn trigger on the field of a RoleTailored client page.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.IObjectControlAddInDefinition
member.summary: Base interface for a control add-in definition interface that binds the control add-in with a data type and raises a event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.IStringControlAddInDefinition
member.summary: Base interface for a control add-in definition interface with a value type and a event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.IValueControlAddInDefinition`1
member.summary: Base interface for a control add-in definition that binds the control add-in with or data types to the Microsoft Dynamics NAV database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.IValueControlAddInDefinition`1.HasValueChanged
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the property has changed its value.
member.returns: true if property has changed its value; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.Style
member.summary: Defines the style enumeration for the control add-in as determined by the Style property of the RoleTailored client page control that is applied with the control add-in.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.WinForms
member.summary: The namespace contains types for creating RoleTailored client control add-ins that have a user interface that is based on .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.WinForms.IWinFormsControlAddIn
member.summary: Defines the interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.WinForms.IWinFormsControlAddIn.AllowCaptionControl
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the RoleTailored client displays a caption control for the control add-in.
member.returns: true to display a caption control; otherwise, false to omit the caption control and use the available space for the entire control.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.WinForms.StringControlAddInBase
member.summary: Base class for a Windows Forms control add-in that binds type data with the Microsoft Dynamics NAV database and uses events to call the OnControlAddin trigger on RoleTailored client page controls.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Invokes the OnControlAddIn trigger of the RoleTailored client page control on which the control add-in is applied.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the property has changed its value.
